**Crops & Castles:** Harvest enchanted produce to gain spells and power up your medieval kingdom in this strategic farming and tower defense hybrid.
**Puzzlot:** Solve procedurally generated logic puzzles to unlock intricate rooms filled with treasures and traps in a mysterious labyrinth.
**Pirate Plunge:** Navigate shifting seas and evade rival buccaneers to collect hidden treasure on a cursed archipelago.
**Time Trinkle:** Manipulate time by flipping tiles forward or backward, solving paradox puzzles to restore history in a fractured world.
**Railway Riddle:** Construct a seamless train track through challenging landscapes to connect distant towns before the clock runs out.
**Haunted Hues:** Restore life to a desaturated, haunted world by unlocking vibrant color palettes hidden within cleverly camouflaged tiles.
**Dungeon Dimensions:** Flip between alternate dimensions using magical portals to solve spatial puzzles and defeat enemies in this tactical RPG.
**Mechanimal:** Befriend mechanical wildlife and construct them into powerful counterparts to solve environmental puzzles on a lost planet.
**Olive Odyssey:** Uncover ancient secrets and complex recipes by harvesting ingredients and cooking them into magical, story-altering dishes.
**Tile Tactics:** Command armies by placing soldier tiles strategically on a grid, achieving victory through clever positioning and terrain advantage.
